body_html: Yeah, sorry. Once we made the repo public, all the forks got disconnected. I made it public now, so you should be able to access it. Right now we only have MPI and custom simple TCP code, but by extending the DataChannel you can make it use any other way of sending the data. Once the library is finished we'll document this for sure.

body: Yeah, sorry. Once we made the repo public, all the forks got disconnected. I made it public now, so you should be able to access it. Right now we only have MPI and custom simple TCP code, but by extending the `DataChannel` you can make it use any other way of sending the data. Once the library is finished we'll document this for sure.
